titleInfo.title: Improvisation: 'lesson in music' and 'night on bald-ass mountain'.

subject.topic: Mussorgsky, Modest Petrovich, 1839-1881. Night on Bald Mountain

mods.note: Harry Madison and William Thornton created 'Lesson in Music' and 'Night on Bald-Ass Mountain' as parodies to classical music and its repertoire. Lesson in Music, lasting 4:35 minutes contains lessons in chordal harmonies and structures with William Thornton on piano and Harry Madison narrating. 'Night on Bald-Ass Mountain' (4:42 minutes) is dedicated to Thornton's wife, Vivian, and is an improvised piano parody of the classical orchestral work 'Night on Bald Mountain' by Modest Mussorgsky, 1886. Again, Thornton on piano and Harry Madison narrating.
